Job Title: FT Truck Mechanic C - DC05

Location: Mauldin, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Address: USA-SC-Mauldin-208 Bi-Lo Boulevard

Store Code: DC 05 Tran Maintenance (7239008)

ADUSA Transportation is the transportation company of Ahold Delhaize USA, providing transportation services to one of the largest grocery retail supply chains in the nation. ADUSA Transportation delivers fresh and nonperishable products to local brand stores and supports the sustainability of the supply chain by returning recyclable items to recycling centers for processing. Our team is supporting the supply chain network evolution to become a fully integrated self-distribution model of the future, serving leading omnichannel grocery brands â€“ Food Lion, Giant Food, The GIANT Company, Hannaford and Stop & Shop. To learn more about our company and the other supply chain companies of Ahold Delhaize USA, visit www.adusasc.com.

Primary Purpose

Responsible for performing basic tasks within the transportation truck shop which can include cleaning, refueling, and basic maintenance.

Duties And Responsibilities

 Handle basic preventative maintenance with supervision Conduct equipment washing Complete vehicle refueling Perform basic service line function (ex. Check tire air pressure, change lights). Training is primarily conducted on-site and on-the-job. Formal training opportunities may be available dependent on shop structure, size and department needs. Strive to find more efficient ways to do the job and seek to reduce costs and improve labor productivity. Make recommendations for modifications to procedures or processes impacting their work group or distribution center that will maximize efficiency, productivity, and reduce costs Ensure compliance with ADUSA Transportation standards in the areas of accuracy, safety and productivity.

Qualifications

 Ability to reach, bend, stoop and lift up to and including 70 lbs. Work in a warehouse environment with varying conditions (i.e. cool temperatures, concrete floors, powered industrial trucks) Strong verbal and written communication skills Ability to use tools required. Ability to analyze situations, identify problems and implement solutions. Ability to meet production standards set by the company

Preferred Requirements

 High school diploma Familiarity/experience in a transportation mechanical environment
